mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reservations r, restaurants rst WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM cancel c WHERE c.reservation_id = r.reservation_id ) and member_id = #{member_ID} and r.restaurant_id = rst.restaurant_id
SELECT * FROM reservations r, restaurants res WHERE r.restaurant_id = res.restaurant_id AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM cancel c WHERE c.reservation_id = r.reservation_id ) AND member_id = #{member_Id}
SELECT * FROM RESERVATIONS res,RESTAURANTS r WHERE RESERVATION_REG_DATE < SYSDATE AND RESERVATION_STATUS = 2 AND member_id = #{memberid} AND res.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservations (reservation_id, member_id, restaurant_id, reservation_per, reservation_price, reservation_date, reservation_reg_date, reservation_status) VALUES (reservation_seq.nextval, #{member_id}, #{restaurant_id}, #{reservation_per}, #{reservation_price}, #{reservation_date}, sysdate, 1);
